CustomField.formula: (5*(FLOOR(( IF(ISBLANK(RMA_Completion_Date_Text__c),If( FAFV_Status__c = 'Completed', FA_FV_Completion_Date__c , TODAY() ),RMA_Completion_Date_Text__c) -DATE(1900,1,8))/7))+MIN(5,MOD(IF(ISBLANK(RMA_Completion_Date_Text__c),If( FAFV_Status__c = 'Completed', FA_FV_Completion_Date__c , TODAY() ),RMA_Completion_Date_Text__c)-DATE(1900,1,8),7)))-(5*(FLOOR((Received_Date__c-DATE(1900,1,8))/7))+MIN(5,MOD(Received_Date__c-DATE(1900,1,8),7)))+1
CustomField.label: Aging Days
